machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Start GCode begin
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}
G28 ;home
G1 X-10 Y-10 F3000
G1 Z0 F1800
M104 S{material_initial_print_temperature} T0 ; Set temps
M109 S{material_initial_print_temperature} T0 ; Wait for temps
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}
G92 E0
G1 E20 F200
G92 E0
;Start GCode end

machine_end_gcode.value:
;End GCode begin
M104 S0 ;extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G90 ;absolute positioning
G92 E0
G1 E-1 F300 ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle to release some of the pressure
G1 Z330 E-1 F60 ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G1 X0 F3000 ;move X to min endstops so the head is out of the way
G1 Y350 F3000 ;so the head is out of the way and Plate is moved forward
M84 ;steppers off
;End GCode end
